title._content: Dr. R.B. Owens, J.J. Carty, Frank Sprague, Wm. Stanley, Sam'l Insull, Dr. Walton Clark, T.A. Edison and wife, Chevalier Van Rappard, Dr. R. Tait McKenzie  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Dr. R.B. Owens, J.J. Carty, Frank Sprague, Wm. Stanley, Sam'l Insull, Dr. Walton Clark, T.A. Edison and wife, Chevalier Van Rappard, Dr. R. Tait McKenzie [between ca. 1910 and ca. 1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from unverified data provided by the Bain News Service on the negatives or caption cards. Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.19159 Call Number: LC-B2- 3486-12
